title: Examining a Scatterplot
question_text:
Created for Albert.io. Copyright 2017. All rights reserved.

The approximate strength and form of the scatterplot is

choices.text: Cannot determine from the information provided.

solution:
In an exponential model, the data demonstrates curves up or down, as the graph shown does.

Since the points are approximately close to the hypothesized curve, the form is strong.

Thus, the correct answer is Choice 'C'.
